name: SFL-Mood
description: 情态系统 (Modality System)：语言资源用于表达说话者对命题（陈述或疑问）真实性或有效性的判断（情态化），或对提议（命令或提供）的义务性或倾向性的判断（意态）。

root.name: grammatical-unit
root.definition: 情态系统 (Modality System)：语言资源用于表达说话者对命题（陈述或疑问）真实性或有效性的判断（情态化），或对提议（命令或提供）的义务性或倾向性的判断（意态）。

children.name: clause
children.definition: 小句 (clause)：具有完整语法结构的语言单位。

children.name: no-connector
children.definition: 无连接词 (no-connector)：小句间没有连接成分。

children.name: with-connector
children.definition: 有连接词 (with-connector)：小句间有连接成分连接。

children.name: evidential-projection
children.definition: 据实投射 (evidential-projection)：表达说话者对信息来源的态度。

children.name: no-evidential-projection
children.definition: 无据实投射 (no-evidential-projection)：不涉及信息来源的表达。

children.name: finite-clause
children.definition: 限定小句 (finite-clause)：含有限定动词的小句。

children.name: relative-clause
children.definition: 关系小句 (relative-clause)：起修饰作用的从属小句。

children.name: simple-finite-clause
children.definition: 简单限定小句 (simple-finite-clause)：基本的限定小句结构。

children.name: declarative-clause
children.definition: 陈述小句 (declarative-clause)：陈述事实的小句。

children.name: imperative-clause
children.definition: 祈使小句 (imperative-clause)：表达命令或请求的小句。

children.name: interrogative-clause
children.definition: 疑问小句 (interrogative-clause)：提出疑问的小句。

children.name: that-clause
children.definition: that小句 (that-clause)：由that引导的从属小句。

children.name: modal-clause
children.definition: 情态小句 (modal-clause)：含有情态动词的小句。

children.name: future-clause
children.definition: 将来小句 (future-clause)：表达将来时间的小句。

children.name: true-modal-clause
children.definition: 真情态小句 (true-modal-clause)：含有真正情态意义的小句。

children.name: nonmodal-clause
children.definition: 非情态小句 (nonmodal-clause)：不含情态动词的小句。

children.name: do-insert
children.definition: do插入 (do-insert)：使用助动词do的结构。

children.name: no-do-insert
children.definition: 无do插入 (no-do-insert)：不使用助动词do的结构。

children.name: past-clause
children.definition: 过去小句 (past-clause)：表达过去时间的小句。

children.name: present-clause
children.definition: 现在小句 (present-clause)：表达现在时间的小句。

children.name: existential-clause
children.definition: 存在小句 (existential-clause)：表达存在关系的小句（如there be结构）。

children.name: extraposition
children.definition: 外置 (extraposition)：主语后置的结构。

children.name: interrogative-cleft
children.definition: 疑问分裂句 (interrogative-cleft)：疑问式的分裂句结构。

children.name: it-cleft
children.definition: it分裂句 (it-cleft)：以it开头的分裂句。

children.name: postponement
children.definition: 延后 (postponement)：成分延后的结构。

children.name: reserved-interrogative-cleft
children.definition: 保留疑问分裂句 (reserved-interrogative-cleft)：特殊的疑问分裂句。

children.name: unmarked-structure
children.definition: 无标记结构 (unmarked-structure)：常规的、无特殊标记的结构。

children.name: future-perfect
children.definition: 将来完成 (future-perfect)：将来完成时。

children.name: future-progressive
children.definition: 将来进行 (future-progressive)：将来进行时。

children.name: future-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 将来进行完成 (future-progressive-perfect)：将来进行完成时。

children.name: modal-perfect
children.definition: 情态完成 (modal-perfect)：情态动词+完成体。

children.name: modal-progressive
children.definition: 情态进行 (modal-progressive)：情态动词+进行体。

children.name: modal-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 情态进行完成 (modal-progressive-perfect)：情态动词+进行完成体。

children.name: past-perfect
children.definition: 过去完成 (past-perfect)：过去完成时。

children.name: past-progressive
children.definition: 过去进行 (past-progressive)：过去进行时。

children.name: past-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 过去进行完成 (past-progressive-perfect)：过去进行完成时。

children.name: present-perfect
children.definition: 现在完成 (present-perfect)：现在完成时。

children.name: present-progressive
children.definition: 现在进行 (present-progressive)：现在进行时。

children.name: present-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 现在进行完成 (present-progressive-perfect)：现在进行完成时。

children.name: simple-future
children.definition: 简单将来 (simple-future)：简单将来时。

children.name: simple-modal
children.definition: 简单情态 (simple-modal)：简单情态形式。

children.name: simple-past
children.definition: 简单过去 (simple-past)：简单过去时。

children.name: simple-present
children.definition: 简单现在 (simple-present)：简单现在时。

children.name: nonfinite-clause
children.definition: 非限定小句 (nonfinite-clause)：不含限定动词的小句。

children.name: infinitive-clause
children.definition: 不定式小句 (infinitive-clause)：由不定式构成的小句。

children.name: past-participle-clause
children.definition: 过去分词小句 (past-participle-clause)：由过去分词构成的小句。

children.name: present-participle-clause
children.definition: 现在分词小句 (present-participle-clause)：由现在分词构成的小句。

children.name: not-perfect-aspect
children.definition: 非完成体 (not-perfect-aspect)：不表达完成意义的动词形式。

children.name: perfect-aspect
children.definition: 完成体 (perfect-aspect)：表达完成意义的动词形式。

children.name: not-phased-clause
children.definition: 非阶段小句 (not-phased-clause)：不含阶段性动词的小句。

children.name: phased-clause
children.definition: 阶段小句 (phased-clause)：含有阶段性动词的小句。

children.name: negative-clause
children.definition: 否定小句 (negative-clause)：表达否定意义的小句。

children.name: positive-clause
children.definition: 肯定小句 (positive-clause)：表达肯定意义的小句。

children.name: not-progressive-aspect
children.definition: 非进行体 (not-progressive-aspect)：不表达进行意义的动词形式。

children.name: progressive-aspect
children.definition: 进行体 (progressive-aspect)：表达进行意义的动词形式。

children.name: active-clause
children.definition: 主动小句 (active-clause)：主动语态的小句。

children.name: passive-clause
children.definition: 被动小句 (passive-clause)：被动语态的小句。

children.name: complex
children.definition: 复合体 (complex)

children.name: adjp-complex
children.definition: 形容词短语复合体 (adjp-complex)：多个形容词短语的组合。

children.name: clause-complex
children.definition: 小句复合体 (clause-complex)：多个小句的组合。

children.name: np-complex
children.definition: 名词短语复合体 (np-complex)：多个名词短语的组合。

children.name: vp-complex
children.definition: 动词短语复合体 (vp-complex)：多个动词短语的组合。

children.name: group
children.definition: 词组 (group)

children.name: adjectival-group
children.definition: 形容词组 (adjectival-group)：以形容词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-adjectival-group
children.definition: 疑问形容词组 (interrogative-adjectival-group)：疑问性质的形容词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-adjectival-group
children.definition: 非疑问形容词组 (noninterrogative-adjectival-group)：非疑问性质的形容词组。

children.name: adverbial-group
children.definition: 副词组 (adverbial-group)：以副词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-adverbial-group
children.definition: 疑问副词组 (interrogative-adverbial-group)：疑问性质的副词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-adverbial-group
children.definition: 非疑问副词组 (noninterrogative-adverbial-group)：非疑问性质的副词组。

children.name: nominal-group
children.definition: 名词组 (nominal-group)：以名词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-noun-group
children.definition: 疑问名词组 (interrogative-noun-group)：疑问性质的名词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-noun-group
children.definition: 非疑问名词组 (noninterrogative-noun-group)：非疑问性质的名词组。

children.name: common-group
children.definition: 普通组 (common-group)：普通名词构成的词组。

children.name: determined-group
children.definition: 有限定组 (determined-group)：有限定词的名词组。

children.name: not-determined-group
children.definition: 无限定组 (not-determined-group)：无限定词的名词组。

children.name: not-predetermined-group
children.definition: 非前限定组 (not-predetermined-group)：无前限定词的名词组。

children.name: predetermined-group
children.definition: 前限定组 (predetermined-group)：有前限定词的名词组。

children.name: not-premodified-group
children.definition: 非前修饰组 (not-premodified-group)：无前置修饰的名词组。

children.name: premodified-group
children.definition: 前修饰组 (premodified-group)：有前置修饰的名词组。

children.name: not-qualified-group
children.definition: 非后置限定组 (not-qualified-group)：无后置限定的名词组。

children.name: qualified-group
children.definition: 后置限定组 (qualified-group)：有后置限定的名词组。

children.name: pronominal-group
children.definition: 代词组 (pronominal-group)：代词构成的词组。

children.name: proper-group
children.definition: 专有组 (proper-group)：专有名词构成的词组。

children.name: plural-group
children.definition: 复数组 (plural-group)：复数形式的名词组。

children.name: singular-group
children.definition: 单数组 (singular-group)：单数形式的名词组。

children.name: prep-group
children.definition: 介词组 (prep-group)：以介词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-prep-group
children.definition: 疑问介词组 (interrogative-prep-group)：疑问性质的介词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-prep-group
children.definition: 非疑问介词组 (noninterrogative-prep-group)：非疑问性质的介词组。

children.name: token
children.definition: 词项 (token)

children.name: punctuation
children.definition: 标点符号 (punctuation)：文本中的标点符号。

children.name: closequote
children.definition: 右引号 (closequote)：结束引用的引号。

children.name: colon
children.definition: 冒号 (colon)：冒号标点。

children.name: comma
children.definition: 逗号 (comma)：逗号标点。

children.name: dollarsign
children.definition: 美元符号 (dollarsign)：货币符号。

children.name: double-quote
children.definition: 双引号 (double-quote)：双引号标点。

children.name: exclamation-mark
children.definition: 感叹号 (exclamation-mark)：感叹号标点。

children.name: hatch
children.definition: 井号 (hatch)：井号符号。

children.name: hyphen
children.definition: 连字符 (hyphen)：连字符标点。

children.name: left-parenthesis
children.definition: 左括号 (left-parenthesis)：左圆括号。

children.name: openquote
children.definition: 左引号 (openquote)：开始引用的引号。

children.name: period
children.definition: 句号 (period)：句号标点。

children.name: question-mark
children.definition: 问号 (question-mark)：问号标点。

children.name: right-parenthesis
children.definition: 右括号 (right-parenthesis)：右圆括号。

children.name: semicolon
children.definition: 分号 (semicolon)：分号标点。

children.name: word
children.definition: 单词 (word)：语言中的词汇单位。

children.name: adjective
children.definition: 形容词 (adjective)：描述名词性质的词。

children.name: cardinal
children.definition: 基数 (cardinal)：基数词。

children.name: comparative-adjective
children.definition: 比较级形容词 (comparative-adjective)：比较级形式的形容词。

children.name: ordinal
children.definition: 序数 (ordinal)：序数词。

children.name: simple-adjective
children.definition: 简单形容词 (simple-adjective)：基本形式的形容词。

children.name: superlative-adjective
children.definition: 最高级形容词 (superlative-adjective)：最高级形式的形容词。

children.name: adverb
children.definition: 副词 (adverb)：修饰动词、形容词或其他副词的词。

children.name: degree-adverb
children.definition: 程度副词 (degree-adverb)：表示程度的副词。

children.name: descriptive-adverb
children.definition: 描述副词 (descriptive-adverb)：描述性副词。

children.name: direction-adverb
children.definition: 方向副词 (direction-adverb)：表示方向的副词。

children.name: frequency-adverb
children.definition: 频率副词 (frequency-adverb)：表示频率的副词。

children.name: interrogative-adverb
children.definition: 疑问副词 (interrogative-adverb)：疑问性副词。

children.name: more-adverb
children.definition: more副词 (more-adverb)：more构成的比较级副词。

children.name: most-adverb
children.definition: most副词 (most-adverb)：most构成的最高级副词。

children.name: not-adverb
children.definition: 否定副词 (not-adverb)：否定副词not。

children.name: place-adverb
children.definition: 地点副词 (place-adverb)：表示地点的副词。

children.name: sufficiency-adverb
children.definition: 充分性副词 (sufficiency-adverb)：表示充分程度的副词。

children.name: time-adverb
children.definition: 时间副词 (time-adverb)：表示时间的副词。

children.name: cd
children.definition: 基数词 (cd)：表示数量的词。

children.name: conjunction
children.definition: 连词 (conjunction)：连接词语或句子的词。

children.name: coordinating-conjunction
children.definition: 并列连词 (coordinating-conjunction)：连接并列成分的连词。

children.name: subordinating-conjunction
children.definition: 从属连词 (subordinating-conjunction)：引导从句的连词。

children.name: determiner
children.definition: 限定词 (determiner)：限定名词的词。

children.name: interrogative-determiner
children.definition: 疑问限定词 (interrogative-determiner)：疑问性限定词。

children.name: noninterrogative-determiner
children.definition: 非疑问限定词 (noninterrogative-determiner)：非疑问性限定词。

children.name: noun
children.definition: 名词 (noun)：表示人、事物、概念的词。

children.name: common-noun
children.definition: 普通名词 (common-noun)：一般的名词。

children.name: proper-noun
children.definition: 专有名词 (proper-noun)：专有名词。

children.name: plural-noun
children.definition: 复数名词 (plural-noun)：复数形式的名词。

children.name: singular-noun
children.definition: 单数名词 (singular-noun)：单数形式的名词。

children.name: preposition
children.definition: 介词 (preposition)：表示关系的词。

children.name: pronoun
children.definition: 代词 (pronoun)：代替名词的词。

children.name: demonstrative-pronoun
children.definition: 指示代词 (demonstrative-pronoun)：指示性代词。

children.name: interrogative-pronoun
children.definition: 疑问代词 (interrogative-pronoun)：疑问性代词。

children.name: personal-pronoun
children.definition: 人称代词 (personal-pronoun)：表示人称的代词。

children.name: 1p-pronoun
children.definition: 第一人称代词 (1p-pronoun)：第一人称代词。

children.name: 2p-pronoun
children.definition: 第二人称代词 (2p-pronoun)：第二人称代词。

children.name: 3p-pronoun
children.definition: 第三人称代词 (3p-pronoun)：第三人称代词。

children.name: plural-pronoun
children.definition: 复数代词 (plural-pronoun)：复数形式的代词。

children.name: singular-pronoun
children.definition: 单数代词 (singular-pronoun)：单数形式的代词。

children.name: there-pronoun
children.definition: there代词 (there-pronoun)：存在句中的there。

children.name: verb
children.definition: 动词 (verb)：表示动作或状态的词。

children.name: lexical-verb
children.definition: 实义动词 (lexical-verb)：具有实际意义的动词。

children.name: 3ps-verb
children.definition: 第三人称单数动词 (3ps-verb)：第三人称单数形式的动词。

children.name: infinitive-verb
children.definition: 不定式动词 (infinitive-verb)：不定式形式的动词。

children.name: past-participle-verb
children.definition: 过去分词动词 (past-participle-verb)：过去分词形式的动词。

children.name: past-verb
children.definition: 过去式动词 (past-verb)：过去式形式的动词。

children.name: present-participle-verb
children.definition: 现在分词动词 (present-participle-verb)：现在分词形式的动词。

children.name: present-verb
children.definition: 现在式动词 (present-verb)：现在式形式的动词。

children.name: modal-verb
children.definition: 情态动词 (modal-verb)：表示情态的助动词。

children.name: yes-no
children.definition: 是否词 (yes-no)：表示肯定或否定的词。

children.name: unkn
children.definition: 未知 (unkn)：无法确定类型的语法单位。
